sub_title: Grant Officer at European Climate Foundation
summary:
On my current position, I am responsible of grant project management, event planning, organising convenings and executive courses at LSE, Harvard and INSEAD.
Previously, I co-founded and managed projects at Incombinacion, a Dutch non-profit organisation. Main role involved consisted in identifying funding opportunities, managing projects and seeking out new projects and partners on topics related to youth and  social entrepreneurship. I have worked in the private and non-profit sector in Ecuador, Switzerland and the USA.

Fascinated by Social Entrepreneurship as it implies innovation focused to design profit and social impact.
Convinced teamwork is the key to achieve the best results. Believe in the idea "act now in bringing, create some semblance of momentum no matter how small". Loving the simplicity of life and its purpose by doing the things I believe are right; set a step for a new journey, continue learning and growing.  


My strengths are:
- Project Management
- Grant Management
- Business Development
- European Funding 
- Event Planning
- Relationship management and communication skills
- Cultural minded
- Resul orientated


☏ 06-19906553 ✉elentabares@yahoo.com
